website_summaries.verdict: A hypoallergenic tape that is strong enough to keep your hairpiece in place but gentle enough to keep you from breaking out in a rash.
pros: Made with men and toupees in mind, but it also can be used to keep clothing or hearing aids in place
Good-quality product at a reasonable price
cons: Adhesive is best for temporary use
Won't work for swimming or bathing

customer_reviews.title: Wardrobe Malfunctions? No More!
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that Jennifer Lopez recommended using toupee tape instead of clothing tape for those clothing items that tend to fall off, slip off etc. This stuff really works! I used with a blouse that's always slipping off my shoulders. Not any more! Caution....when used directly on your skin peel off carefully the adhesive is strong. Slowly roll it off with a bit of talc powder.
customer_reviews.author: Redhawk

customer_reviews.title: I would never purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I have never given any product one star; however, these strips are completely useless unless you want to use them as regular tape. I tried using these with a lace front wig and they just did not work. It would not stick and it is clearly visible. And this got good reviews....I can't understand! No thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: This won’t hold down your frontal sis.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t really do much for my frontal wig. You can see the shine of the tape through the lace, which is very obvious on black skin. On top of that it didn’t have much hold. I guess the weight of a 24” wig is too much compared to the 5” inch toupees it’s usually used for. I’d suggest using bold hold tape.
customer_reviews.author: Devynn Barber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sticking Power!
customer_reviews.text: These strips are absolutely perfect for attaching our son's cochlear implant behind his ear so it doesn't fall off as easily. These strips are strong enough to hold the device on, yet they don't irritate his skin. It's been wonderful to have an added protection against the loss of a very delicate and expensive device!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tape for years due to Alopecia. Holds my wigs in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy until they run out of stock!
customer_reviews.text: I use these every weekend at rodeos. I put the strip on the inside front of my hat band, and it holds my hat to my head no matter how much sweat and makeup comes in contact with the tape!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gapping Shirts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a button-up shirt to complete my costume for a murder mystery dinner party. The shirt arrived a few days before the party, but it was wayyyy too small, and I had ridiculously huge gaps around the buttons. I bought Topstick via Amazon Prime, and it arrived the day before the party. I used Topstick to tape the gaps closed. The Topstick was strong and the shirt stayed together and looked great all night. No one (other than me) knew the shirt was too small. I'm never wearing that shirt again because it was hard to breathe in it, but I am definitely going to use Topstick for future button-up shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Just sticky enough.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to stick something to skin this has always been this Costume Designers go to brand.
customer_reviews.author: Romance addict

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Super worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wish I found this a long time ago! I watch All Things Adrienne on YT and she recommended this product, of course she’s a celebrity so I wanted to try it out and it was a part of her tips and tricks of how to keep her clothes from peeping or from showing any of her skin/cleavage from showing any skin. AND girlllllll!!!!! It works!!!! All the target and Walmart ones cannot compre this this one so pls try this one! It’s super sticky so once you stick it do not remove it! I once washed my clothes and sometimes it doesn’t come off lol
customer_reviews.author: Micah Gay-ya

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to my fingers not my hairline
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to use these 2 times time The only thing these things are sticking to are my fingers. I do not have money to waste. I believe yesterday was my deadline I wish to have my money back anyway. Please contact the seller. will definitely be writing a negative review. I spend too much money on Amazon to have a product that does not work I have tried Rubbing alcohol on my face to make sure I get a good solid grip and my lace front wig. its sticking to my fingers and That's all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for lacefront wigs
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for lacefront wigs. Does not hold the lace very little adhesive. Also please note that the item cannot be returned. What a rip off. I would give this zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Handy for all sorts of things.
customer_reviews.text: I find all sorts of uses for these. When my son was in choir and theatre I stuck down his ties and various wardrobe items so they didn’t go eskew while on stage. I’ve used these to keep clothing hemmed or in place. Thought I might be able to use these on the bridge of my nose while wearing my mask. Super useful. Much cheaper than Hollywood tape.
customer_reviews.author: wendy g

customer_reviews.title: Great for taping clothing to skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it to tape down clothing. Sometimes the necklines of my dresses move around throughout the evening and this keeps the fabric in place. I used to buy the expensive women's products from fredricks or Victoria's secret. These work so much better and are much less expensive. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Linares

customer_reviews.title: Really sticks
customer_reviews.text: This really makes the wig stick to your skin. Don't get it on your hair because it will rip out the hair. My wig never moved off my head and I was on a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: I will never, never be without this tape. No more itching and discomfort like others.. I use this tape while on vacation, went to the beach, kept my wig well fitted for three weeks .. honest truth!
customer_reviews.author: Moe Moe

customer_reviews.title: Holds comfortably in place.
customer_reviews.text: The tape is wider than others I have used but it does the job it is supposed to do. I have alopecia so my wig slides all over on my bald head. With this very comfortable double-sided tape my wig holds firm even while working outside in the hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Koalatfriend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Keeping Mask in Place
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep my mask tight around my nose and cheeks so my glasses don't become fogged and it works completely perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great for toupee
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hold a toupee on a bald head. Easy to use. Backing tapes easy to peel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Segal

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is not sweat proof nor is it waterproof was hoping finally I found a great product only to get again b let down and disappointed and wasted money AGAIN DO NOT BUY !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would work great because of the good reviews but they were a total flop for me. They don't stick well, not sure if its because my skin is oily but I will not be repurchasing these. Highly unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price, easy to modify
customer_reviews.text: We use these to keep our daughter cochleae implant on her ear because she’s still pretty small. Can not recommend this stuff enough. Much better price than going to Sally’s or somewhere like that. Easy to cut to modify to whatever size you need. Sticks as long as you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stick to anything at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. It doesn't stick to my finger, let alone to the toupee. I might have gotten it from a defective batch, but it doesn't change the situation. Unfortunately I figured that out when the return window was expired, otherwise, I would returned it with no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great utilitarian product
customer_reviews.text: This tape will stick pretty much anything to skin. I've used it for pasties and this particular purchase was to keep Klingon ridge prosthetics on foreheads for a play. Sweat will weaken the bond, but the hold is stellar for a product that doesn't require a remover and is designed to be skin-safe.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It really sticts
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to use with hair piece. Price is half what we were paying for it elsewhere. The tape is also great to use other ways as it is two sided . Attach brastrap to blouse to keep strap from falling down shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE CONNERS

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I got these to keep my wig in place. It holds up through a lot of sweating!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It does not stick well. Wouldn’t recommend. Only pro is that it doesn’t leave a sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always have it in my kit
customer_reviews.text: I am a makeup/hair styist and I use them on set all the time. Not just for wigs but for putting a mic on to talent. Keeping a blouse from dropping down to far.
customer_reviews.author: denise hutter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't have pictures because I ordered this for a friend. He seem to be pleased and no complaints so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! But it wasn’t as sticky as I hoped. It held nicely on the very top of my head but wouldn’t stick to the lace on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesion, don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Needed for use during an event. Very easy to use, but the adhesion was almost nonexistent. Felt like I wasted my money, would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: U.N. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Just use regular scotch tapes from office depot instead.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. False reviews. False advertising. Does not stick properly at all. I just threw them out! Dont waste money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Better than clothing tape...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet...goes in the wedding emergency kit!!! Supposed to be better than the tape movie stars use to prevent slipping off clothes(nip slip?!)
customer_reviews.author: JUDY From Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nip Slip Saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those deep v blouses, side boob tops, etc. I used it for a crotchet bathing suit top that would not consistently cover my nips. Perfect for those outfits that need to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: We buy yearly
customer_reviews.text: Buy these every year for dance. They are great! My daughter does complain sometimes it hurt coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on a dress that would not stay in place. It did not stick at all and it irritated my skin. I would not suggested if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: sandy guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great for hearing aids and CI
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job keeping my infants hearing aid on. Now it holds my toddlers CI on. Doesn't hurt when removed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyliak

customer_reviews.title: works for hearing aids
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for for keeping hearing aids on my infant with hearing loss. In case any parent is wondering. The tape works better than any hat or fancy head band I've tried. Will definitely continue to use the tape while she's a toddler and probably well into childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah deNagy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Hearing aids!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to be by an audiologist to help my son's hearing aids from falling out when he's active and participating in sports. This product works great and my son no longer has anxiety about losing his aids when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Very low end quality.
customer_reviews.text: They came off with in 1 week. Never had that before from any others. Terrible stick power.
customer_reviews.author: Djdc

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my husband's hearing aids in place
customer_reviews.text: These work really well to keep his hearing aids from sliding off. I'm sure they are good for other things, too, but they are really GREAT for this.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn ArmstrongTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Will stay, breaks skin.
customer_reviews.text: The tape did the trick to keep my cap sleeves in place during my wedding and reception. The only draw back is that the adhesive made my skin break out.

customer_reviews.title: Not loving this tape
customer_reviews.text: These are not cut the correct size and the adhesive does not stick. Not sure if i received an old batch?
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Pezzini

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesive power
customer_reviews.text: This holds clothes to skin or fabric better than any I have used. Hard to get in place and needs to be on a dispenser like double faced scotch tape
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: This tape is really strong, even on hot days when your head sweats. Buying them this way is lots cheaper than buying them from Sally's.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more stick
customer_reviews.text: I’m new at wearing a wig and thought the tape might be better than the Bobby pins I’m using. The tape wasn’t strong enough to hold onto my wig.

customer_reviews.title: Work great...
customer_reviews.text: Use these to hold my wig in place everyday. They work great. Have been using them for about 4 years.

customer_reviews.title: Tight bond even for women
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and easy to use. As a woman with 14" hair my piece will stay on without washing for about 3 days

customer_reviews.title: I would like this in a baseball card size if you sell ...
customer_reviews.text: your going to laugh because i know this is not for use with wigs. I am a face painter and I use this double sticky tape for making bling to use on some of our clients and models. I would like this in a baseball card size if you sell it. Thank you for great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays stuck when sweaty.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to keep competitive dance costumes in place. Best stuff ever after 9 years. Never slips when sweaty.

customer_reviews.title: Let me tell you what they can hear!
customer_reviews.text: I work with deaf and hard of hearing 3-4 year old children. This is the best for adhering their hearing devices to their ears. One student even wears her processors now because they don’t flop around!! It’s amazing what she hears and she’s even starting to talk now!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has great adherence
customer_reviews.text: . I really like this product. Very good adhesion, easy to apply and lasts all day.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Packages
customer_reviews.text: Both packages were damaged and strips were loose inside packing envelope. Boxes were crushed ! Extremely disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place and nearly invisible
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a competition dancer, and we love this tape. Through all her moves, leaps and jumps, it's sticks true. Forever our go to

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: These little guys do exactly what they’re supposed to do. I’ve ordered these adhesive several times. A necessity.

customer_reviews.title: Good as Dress Tape
customer_reviews.text: Used these for dress tape at a wedding for the bride and bridesmaids. Worked pretty well with minimal irritation.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good. I ordered wrong with. Will try same brand next time but different size.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STICK TO FABRIC WELL
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended this instead of regular fabric tape for my wedding dress. I used probably 8 sheets of the topstick and it STILL WOULDNT HOLD the fabric to me. So DONT SUBSTITUTE THIS FOR FABRIC TAPE!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to us as fashion tape!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for double sided fashion tape and it can withstand a full 24 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Priced lower than anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Strong adhesion and much cheaper that beauty supply stores. Plus, it's a 2 pack!.

customer_reviews.text: I love this tape. I use it for EVERYTHING. Great at holding clothes in place or for a quick hem. I will buy this stuff as long as it's in production.

customer_reviews.text: Get rid of all of your regular fashion tape... this tape is your answer!

customer_reviews.text: This is my third time purchasing this product. I like them very much, they are easy to use and hold very well all day without heavy sweating.

customer_reviews.title: Good stick, just not for holding dress straps in place.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hold down some slippery dress straps on multiple bridesmaids. Held right after application, but all lost their stick halfway through pictures taken before the wedding.

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's this Cali heat or what but these won't stick. When I did get them to stick then they started lifting which is not a good look. I found another brand that works way better. Maybe I'll try these again in the fall/winter with better luck.
customer_reviews.author: blaqkitty99

customer_reviews.title: Not the best shape for hairpieces
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, the tape seems to have a very good tack and it is very easy to apply. However, the tape is rectangular. It does not fit on the curves of my hairpiece. I have to cut each piece into a semi-curved shape to make it fit. ( I have since found out I need a CC contour) I'm trying to figure out how to cut the other 98 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Wardrobe Magic
customer_reviews.text: Strips will secure your scarf all day. No time to fix a small hem rip, use a Topstick strip. Strips pull off and do not damage fabric.
customer_reviews.author: On Time

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for these great products!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Hold my hair system in place securely. And I have a convertible!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I have alopecia. This product holds up in winter winds and summer humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D. Trimnal

customer_reviews.title: Great for cochlear implants!
customer_reviews.text: Our child has cochlear implants on both ears. We cut each piece of tape down to 6 stripes. We use these to stick the processor to the ear. It holds for 12 plus hours of a rough and tough toddler. Don't ever have to worry about them falling off the ears. Bought this as a recommendation from other cochlear parents. Even holds with a little moisture (sweat). I'm sure if you were to use this tape for it's intended purpose it would work great also. We have used this for 2 years now and wouldn't use any other brand. Will keep using for years to come. 2 boxes lasts us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my face masks
customer_reviews.text: So I got this to use on my face mask to adhere it under my eyes so my glasses don’t fog up. Works perfectly for that. I needed something that was hypoallergenic, I have many allergies and sensitive skin. I have had no problems with it irritating or causing an allergic reaction on my face. The only problem I’ve had is if I remove it to briefly take off the mask it sometimes doesn’t stick again(mostly if it’s humid or I’m sweaty😬) All in all I am very happy with it and have already recommended it to many people
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Used to stick down masks on face
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had an idea that I could use them on my face to stick down a face mask so that it would protect better from Covid. Hubby and I did it a few times and it does work great for that, but I think we just got kind of bored or tired of it and didn’t do it again. I’m glad I have it, though, and there are a lot of them in the pack! It does stick very well, and I’m sure I will find additional uses for them, like as fashion tape or something.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use with a sleep aid unit, SomniResonance, where I have to stick it to my body while I sleep. This product is way more affordable and easy to use than the recommended brand by the company. Plus, you only use half the strip at a time, making it 200 applications per package. I have no skin irritation from this product either, but another I tried did give me a rash. I'm very happy and will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rutabagapie

product_meta.title: Vapon Topstick 1" X 3" - 50 Strips in each box (2 boxes) Hypo-Allergenic All Purpose Clear Double Tape
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionVapon Topstick 1" X 3" - 50 Strips in each box (2 boxes) Hypo-Allergenic All Purpose Clear Double Tape
feature_bullets: Holds wigs, hair pieces, wardrobes, weaving hair, home decors, many other creative use
Clear, double-sided, medical adhesive tape in strips, used to hold hairpieces to the scalp.
Hypo-allergenic, waterproof, high quality tape does not separate when removed
The back liner is slit for easy opening. Apply tape to the tape tab or perimeter of hairpiece. Can be applied to the entire hairpiece interior for a secure hold.
2 boxes - total of 100 tape stripes (50 tapes in each box)
